item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to the OWASP Sathyabama Student Chapter! We are a group of passionate students who are dedicated to promoting cybersecurity awareness and education. Our aim is to help our fellow students learn about the importance of cybersecurity and security-related issues, as well as provide a platform to enhance their skills in this field. As a student chapter of OWASP (Open Web Application Security Project), we are part of a global community that works towards improving the security of web applications and software.
